name: Che Madame Necklace
description:
A playful combination of an unexpected, every day, ordinary material with the luxury of silk cord and sterling silver. I designed and made this necklace for the contemporary, art loving, recycling, eco-friendly woman who dares to wear jewelry that is out of the ordinary. I think it would look spectacular on a bride.

This necklace is delicate and almost weightless. I used pieces of plastic bags and fused them into free form shapes to make the delicate white flowers which are flexible but very sturdy. I've secured these flowers onto a silk cord with sterling silver wire. Three of these flowers have tiny 4mm peacock cultured pearls (matching the color of the cord), and placed randomly on the necklace.

Necklace measures 17 1/2" (45 cm). Flowers' diameters are about 2 1/2" (6 cm)to 1 1/4" (3cm).

Let me know if you'd like a different length, or if you'd prefer white cord and pearls.

Thanks for looking!

name: Fused Plastic Pin
description:
This listing is for a Fused Plastic Pin. It is made to order. The one pictured above has been sold, but I will make another one just like it (but not exactly, as it is handmade). Please allow 4 business days for completion.

It is "Eco-Friendly" and beautiful. These delicate fused plastic "flowers" are light, yet very durable. I have layered several of these fused flowers to make a graceful bloom. I've placed a sterling silver ball in the middle which adds to this piece. I have tumbled the sterling silver pin for shine and resistance. It is slightly curved towards the front for easy placement on your garment. I have added a little copper cap to the end of the pin for safety and attached a length of steel flex wire to it so it doesn't get lost.

name: Fused Plastic Earrings
description:
For the contemporary, art loving, recycling, eco-friendly woman who dares to to wear jewelry that is out of the ordinary.

These earrings are delicate and almost weightless. I used pieces of plastic bags and fused them into free form shapes to make the delicate white flowers which are flexible but very sturdy.

"Flowers" are about 1" in diameter. Total earring length is about 1 1/4".

All metal is sterling silver.
